body: It's something that records extra metadata about execution of Functions - e.g. if any of their inputs should be captured (i.e. `input_idx`th input should be saved into `output_idx`th output in the captures vector).
body_html: It's something that records extra metadata about execution of Functions - e.g. if any of their inputs should be captured (i.e. input_idxth input should be saved into output_idxth output in the captures vector).
